class.name: AnimationNodeAnimation
class.brief_description: Input animation to use in an [AnimationNodeBlendTree].
class.description: A resource to add to an [AnimationNodeBlendTree]. Only features one output set using the [member animation] property. Use it as an input for [AnimationNode] that blend animations together.

members.member: Animation to use as an output. It is one of the animations provided by [member AnimationTree.anim_player].
Determines the playback direction of the animation.
